ns:common.topic.description: RDF Inference Language is an open format designed to express expert systems rules and queries that operate on RDF models. RIL uses an XML vocabulary to define rules for a RIL processor to operate on an RDF model.\nElements of RIL have been integrated into Versa.
rdfs:label: RDF Inference Language

ns:common.document.text: RDF Inference Language (RIL) is an open format designed to express expert systems rules and queries that operate on RDF models. RIL uses an XML vocabulary to define rules for a RIL processor to operate on an RDF model.\nElements of RIL have been integrated into Versa.

ns:type.object.name: RDF Inference Language
